findings.reasoning: The finding claims the same vulnerability exists in the same location with the same root cause as the original issue. The fix was applied to prevent flash loan oracle manipulation.

The finding identifies a real vulnerability that was not the target of the fix. The contract makes external calls to IERC20(asset).transferFrom and IERC20(asset).transfer without following the checks-effects-interactions pattern, making it vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

target_assessment.false_positive_reasoning: The finding matches both the location (UwuLendingPool.borrow) and the root cause (oracle returns spot price calculated from current Curve pool balances) of the original vulnerability. The fix was applied to prevent flash loan oracle manipulation.

notes: The model correctly identified a separate reentrancy vulnerability in the contract.
